entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 6:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain after midnight. Blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm inland. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 15 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
